bib.title: Application of Statistic Properties of Letters Succession in Polish Language to Handprint Recognition
bib.author: Sas, Jerzy and Kurzynski, Marek
bib.abstract: In the paper the method of handprinted word recognition is described, which combines statistical lexical language model and character classifier properties in order to improve the recognition accuracy. The statistical lexical model determines the conditional probabilities of letters succession in the language. For some letters in polish language only very small subset of successors appears with significant conditional probability.
